transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haanji.
Customer: Haan good morning sir.
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Uh, maine hai na aapka IndiaMART ka subscription liya tha.
Executive: Ji Deshmukh ji baat kar rahe na aap? Santosh ji, Sudesh Deshmukh ji. Ji sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan sir bataiye. Haan sir, sir mai ye bolna tha, ye bolna chahta tha, maine
Customer: sir abhi thoda business hai na thoda band ho gaya.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Matlab pura supply viplai ka stop ho gaya ekdam.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan, toh mujhe woh ID ye karna tha, band karna tha.
Executive: ID band karna hai aapko, IndiaMART band karna hai, right?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Customer: Toh uska abhi mai use bhi nahi ho raha na sir, mujhe kuch usse kuch fayda bhi nahi hua. Aur ye use bhi nahi ho raha kuch.
Executive: Nahi toh mai ye jaan na, ye mujhe ye clear nahi batao aap band karna chahte ho, maine baat maani aapki band karna chahte ho, par kyun? Reason kya hai? Use nahi ho pa raha isliye ya phir band ho gaya isliye ya phir business nahi mil raha isliye?
Customer: Business, ek toh business toh mera band ho gaya. Aur matlab mujhe kuch abhi mere paas supply bhi nahi hai, kuch bhi nahi hai mere paas. Aur band bhi ho gaya kuch reason ki wajah se, isliye band karna chahta hu.
Executive: Matlab, theek hai mai samajh gaya aapka kehna ye hai ki aapka, aapne apna khud ka business hi band kar diya is wajah se aap chahte hai ki aapko yaha se IndiaMART se account bhi hata diya jaaye, sahi baat hai?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: But sir us time, us time pehle aapke conversation hui thi tab aap keh rahe the ki business toh aapka chal raha hai. Main reason jo tha aapka conversion ka.
Customer: Haan toh woh chal raha tha lekin woh utna ho nahi paaya na, toh abhi mera ye idhar ka exterior ka jo business hai woh band ho gaya na.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aisa hai, toh aap, aapne toh band karne ka hai toh usko kya, kya rehta woh aapne return ka kya, kya kya nahi?
Executive: Band kyun kar rahe hai, sir business aapka chal raha hai na, isko chalne dijiye.
Customer: Aapko business aapka chal hi raha hai.
Executive: Chal raha hota toh mai band kyun karunga sir? Chal raha hota toh mai band kyun karunga? Chal hi nahi, chal hi raha nahi matlab mera band hi hua toh kaise karenge? Mere paas na maal hai, na mai aisa toh supply kar pa raha hu, na koi mujhe supply de raha hai, toh mai kya kya hi karunga? Fokat me koi
Executive: Offline toh chal raha hoga na aapka?
Customer: Offline, yahi toh bol raha tha na mai aapko, offline bhi toh nahi hai na.
Customer: Offline bhi band ho gaya.
Customer: Haan, isliye toh offline hota toh kaise waise toh chala sakte the na.
Executive: Teen second. Accha.
Executive: Teen second.
Customer: Toh isliye bol raha tha woh mujhe band karne ka hai. Toh haan jab kya naya kuch chalu karenge, naya kuch business agar ho gaya toh phir phir se woh mai aapko join kar lunga sir. Lekin abhi kaise hai, abhi nahi karunga toh ye fokat me mera subscription jaayega na sir?
Executive: Kya keh rahe ho sir aap thoda, aap phir se repeat karenge?
Customer: Mai ye keh raha tha ki abhi toh mera band ho gaya. Haan, theek hai. Toh ye jo maine subscription, subscription jo liya hai ye mera toh fokat me jaayega. Mai matlab iska mera kuch fayda bhi nahi ho raha, kuch use bhi nahi kar raha mai, uske uske matlab ye bhi nahi ho raha toh kaise karenge?
Executive: Kya keh rahe ho matlab jo aapka kehne ka matlab ye hai ki aapka band karwaoge business toh aapka jo subscription liya uska paisa bachega woh aapko refund ho jaayega, ye aap ye kehna chaah rahe ho?
Customer: Haan, kuch ho gaya toh.
Executive: Ji sir, toh ye toh aap clearly ye hai ki aap band karaoge business aapko refund toh nahi hoga na sir.
Customer: Uh, kyun sir waise toh ho sakta hai na refund, aisa thodi hai. Aapne, maine jitna use kara utne ka aap kaat, kaat lo na paisa.
Executive: Haan, woh aapka woh aisa nahi hota na sir ki aapne jitne ka use kiya utne ka paisa kaat le uske baad hum refund kara de. Refund toh sir possibly hota hi nahi hai refund ka toh.
Customer: Nahi, aisa thodi hai sir, agar kuch nahi ho raha hai toh hum use kar ke kya karenge na?
Executive: Ye toh sir, ye toh sir recharge ki tarah hai jaise aapne recharge karaya ek, ek mahine ka usme se aapne do din istemal kar liya phir keh rahe ho ki recharge wali company ko ki aap mera aisa karo recharge cancel kar do, do din ka paise kaat lo.
Customer: Ye refund.
Customer: Nahi aisa lekin aapko woh barabar hai lekin recharge ka alag hai, ye alag system hai na sir. Ye humne aise thodi recharge ka chalo aapka
Customer: recharge ka kaise rehta, do-300 rupay diye aapne chalo theek hai, net bhi use kare toh kuch na kuch net toh chalega, net toh chalega kaam me toh aayega na.
Executive: Haan toh sir, abhi aapki marketing, iski aapki marketing dekho aapki yaha pe marketing chal rahi hai.
Customer: Marketing chalne se kya fayda hai sir, kuch bech hi nahi pa rahe toh hum. Matlab kuch jaa hi nahi raha, hamare kuch hamare paas abhi nahi hai, offline bhi nahi bech rahe tha hum, toh kya karenge marketing kar ke?
Executive: Mujhe toh firstly sir aap ye clear kijiye ki aapka business conversion nahi ho raha isliye aap business nahi kar pa rahe? Ya phir aapka IndiaMART se IndiaMART se woh business hi nahi nikal pa raha isliye aap band kar rahe hai ya phir offline bhi band ho gaya, pehle aap ye clear kijiye.
Customer: Dekhiye toh pehle, pehla toh ye hai ki mujhe mera offline bhi band ho gaya. Theek hai, pehla ye ki aapko offline me jo aap bech rahe the woh bhi band ho gaya, theek hai. Haan, toh abhi offline band hua toh mai online bhi nahi kar paunga na. Theek hai, offline band hua toh aap online bhi nahi kar paoge, theek hai. Haan, dusri baat jo mai jo jab chalu kiya, idhar se mujhe uska response bhi nahi aaya na. Jaise maine IndiaMART chalu kiya abhi mujhe lag raha hai do-dhai mahine ho gaye dhai, ya abhi shayad abhi chaar-paanch din me teen mahine bhi ho sakte hai. Hmm. Jyada bhi time nahi hua lekin mujhe uska kuch fayda bhi nahi hua utna. Accha, theek hai. Haan, toh isliye mai rakh ke bhi kya karunga na sir? Aapko jo kya hai, aapka jo kuch hai woh ye theek hai, ab mai aapko properly, ab mai aapka properly concern samajh gaya hu, ye ye hai ki aapka kya offline outlet tha woh bhi band ho gaya lekin jab online pe bhi aap aaye toh jis tarike se aapki expectation thi woh match nahi ho paayi time ke hisab se toh aap isse bhi band karna chahte hai, sahi baat hai? Haan, haan, haan. Theek hai, ab mai, mujhe time dijiye thoda mai check kar leta hu phir mai aapko call karta hu, theek hai sir? Okay, okay. Call kar ke batana zara.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close IndiaMART subscription.

- Offline business is closed, no supply.

- No response from IndiaMART after subscription.

- Wants a refund for the subscription amount.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified refund is not possible.

- Executive will check and call back.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business closure, offline business
